entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'. #60006
  • Verify incremental parsing merged `EqualsGreaterThanToken` in `ParseLambdaExpression()` #60002
  • `GetHashCode` of `Span<T>` is not suggested in `nameof` context #59998
  • CoreCompile target claims the wrong input for signing key #59992
    17.2
  • Win32ResourceFile not working #59990
  • ArgumentNullException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteBlockActionsCore #59988

Closed

  • SyntaxContexts IsGlobalStatementContext should take file scoped namespaces into consideration #59931
    17.3
  • CSharpGoToImplementation.SimpleGoToImplementation test is not deterministic #59950
    17.2
  • Valid keywords missing from completion list between parentheses #58921
    17.2
  • IntelliSense suggests GetType on a span, but it won't compile #35178
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from EditAndContinue.BreakpointSpans.TryGetBreakpointSpan #59827
    17.2
  • BUG in VS2022 on Visual Basic code when click on Peek Definition doesn't show the element, shows the file where is declared at the first line. #58809
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix support for OOP reporting diagnostics in source generated files #60016
    Area-Analyzers
  • Clarify breaking change documentation for struct initialization and correct link #60015
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Diagnostics Multi-Line Errors #60013
    Area-IDE
  • Handle invalid syntax in CSharpRecommendationServiceRunner #60012
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60011
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • Add details on validating related to EnC #60008
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IsFabricatedToken assert #60005
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify code with helper method #60000
    Area-IDE
  • KeyOriginatorFile is input to csc task #59999
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • [LSP] Allow Razor to utilize C# LSP server in tests #59995
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Fix typo in CodeGenDifferences.md #59994
    Area-SDK and Samples
  • Trim leading blank lines in IDE0017 #59993
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • ColorSchemes namespace refactoring #59985
    Area-IDE
  • Enable embedded languages to export the identifier they should be associated with in comments/attributes #59983
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Flatten Implementation directory in VS layer #59986
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Always enable breakable range LSP handler #59997
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.2
  • Update integration tests to support both possible Go To Implementation results #59956
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • CSharpImportAdder should be able to add the intended import if the identifier is a var #59947
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #60003
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • SyntaxContext's GlobalStatementContext changes #59957
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update version number for our 17.3 Preview 1 builds #60001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add build triggers to azure pipeline yaml #60009
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update LOC branch for 17.2 release #59996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge features/patterns-span-char to release/dev17.3 #59962
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose ForceExpandedCompletionIndexCreation option to O# #59958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add build triggers to azure pipeline yaml #60007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Capability tracking #59938
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Refactor the embedded-language-detector components to make them reusable for any languages. #59987
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude object's methods from ref struct completion list #59884
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59991
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59984
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Annotate BreakpointSpans and fix NREs #59846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Break out embedded language classification (MEF side) #59905
    Area-IDE
  • Add new feature to fix invalid constraints. #59889
    Area-IDE, Feature Request

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #60018
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #60017
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify consumption side of the new async navigation helpers. #59838
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up info bar and error reporting service #59981
    Area-IDE
  • Move diagnostic service to LSP layer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Require a matching regular operator for a checked operator #59937
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Fix !! incremental parsing #59977
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #59968
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59971
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #59874
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 2 #59980
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused local #59963
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE
  • fix braces indentation for anonymous methods (#47237) #59979
    Area-IDE, Community
